description: This one pot curry is the ultimate lazy evening meal, with plenty of veggies and quinoa to fill you up.
keywords: Madras,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,One-pot,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Cauliflower,Dairy free
name: Cauliflower & Quinoa One Pot Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and sliced
2.4 cup vegetable stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large, deep pan on medium heat and cook the onions, garlic, ginger and curry paste together for 5 minutes. In another pan, bring the stock to the boil and add the coconut milk.
Add the cauliflower, mixed vegetables and quinoa to the curry mix and pour over the hot stock and coconut milk mix. Simmer for 10-12 minutes until the quinoa is cooked.
Stir in lime juice, scatter coriander on top and serve.
